description: This file defines a React functional component named AuthDialog, which provides a user interface for authentication, supporting login and signup modes. It manages local state for email and password inputs, handles form submission, and displays error messages.

methods.name: AuthDialog({ open, onSubmit, onCancel, mode, loading, error })
methods.description: React functional component for authentication dialog with email and password inputs, supporting different modes and error handling.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, invoking the onSubmit callback with email and password values.

ctags.name: AuthDialog
ctags.pattern: /^function AuthDialog({ open, onSubmit, onCancel, mode, loading, error }) {$/
ctags.signature: ({ open, onSubmit, onCancel, mode, loading, error })
